flawed_nl_solution:
Bucket B has 3 more fruits than C (which has 9 fruits) for a total of 9+3 = <<3+9=17>>17 fruits
Bucket A has 4 more fruits than B (which has 17 fruits) for a total of 17+4 = <<4+17=21>>21 fruits
All three buckets have a total of 9+17+21 = <<9+17+21=47>>47 fruits
#### 47

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 17. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
